remarks: Characterize a submonoid by closure properties.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
issubmnd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
issubmnd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
issubmnd.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
issubmnd.h $e |- H = ( G |`s S ) $.
issubmnd $p |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ S C_ B /\ .0. e. S ) -> ( H e. Mnd <-> A. x e. S A. y e. S ( x .+ y ) e. S ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d .0. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d S x y $.
